statements: SELECT * FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress FROM StudentProgress;
SELECT student_id, performance_grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE performance_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress, milestones_completed FROM StudentProgress WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM StudentProgress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, progress, performance_grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE milestones_completed > 5 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT course_id, milestones_completed FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 AND performance_grade = 'A';
SELECT student_id, progress, performance_grade FROM StudentProgress WHERE course_id IN (101, 102, 103) ORDER BY student_id, progress ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS total_courses, AVG(progress) AS avg_progress FROM StudentProgress WHERE progress > 0.6 AND performance_grade = 'B';
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age FROM students WHERE grade='A';
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age FROM students;
SELECT student_id, grade FROM students WHERE progress > 80;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, progress FROM students WHERE progress > 50 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, end_date FROM courses WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, name, age, progress, grade FROM students ORDER BY age DESC, progress ASC;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT student_name, class FROM students WHERE age < 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, class, age FROM students WHERE class='10A' AND age >= 15;
SELECT student_name, age, grade FROM students INNER JOIN progress ON students.student_id = progress.student_id WHERE percentage_complete >= 50;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age, class FROM students;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE credit_hours > 3 ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, percentage_complete FROM students s, courses c, progress p WHERE s.student_id = p.student_id AND c.course_id = p.course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE instructor LIKE 'J%' AND credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT student_name, course_name, percentage_complete, grade FROM students s INNER JOIN progress p ON s.student_id = p.student_id ORDER BY s.student_name, course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE progress > 50;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT assignment_name, due_date, max_score FROM assignments WHERE max_score > 100 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id WHERE grade >= 80;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;

SELECT student_name, progress, course_name FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON grades.assignment_id = assignments.assignment_id JOIN courses ON assignments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT student_name, grade, feedback FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON grades.assignment_id = assignments.assignment_id;
SELECT student_name, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id GROUP BY student_name;

SELECT student_name, grade, assignment_name, due_date FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id JOIN assignments ON grades.assignment_id = assignments.assignment_id ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT id, student_id, milestone, completion_date FROM student_progress ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT milestone, completion_date FROM student_progress WHERE student_id=1;
SELECT name, grade FROM student_performance WHERE subject='Math';
SELECT id, class_name, teacher_id FROM class ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_progress;
SELECT milestone, completion_date FROM student_progress WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT subject, grade FROM student_performance WHERE student_id = 2 ORDER BY grade DESC;

SELECT sp.milestone, sp.completion_date, st.name AS student_name FROM student_progress sp JOIN class cl ON sp.student_id = cl.id JOIN teacher t ON cl.teacher_id = t.id JOIN student_performance spf ON sp.student_id = spf.student_id JOIN subject st ON spf.subject = st.id WHERE t.name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM student_performance WHERE student_id IN (SELECT student_id FROM student_progress WHERE milestone = 'Final Exam' AND completion_date > '2022-01-01');
